actions.recommendation: Please repeat kidney function tests when well hydrated.
BMI at 26.8 is slightly elevated. Waist-to-height ratio at 48 % is normal. Aim to keep BMI between 18.5-24.9. This will decrease the risk of illnesses like diabetes & hypertension.
Supplements like Rhychol will also help you lower cholesterol.

To help lower cholesterol, lower intake of saturated fats such as is found in animal & full cream animal products. Choose unrefined carbohydrates & good fats found in seeds, nuts, oily fish & avocado.
